queries.query: select Person.short_name, Person.person_id from Person, Person_Classification, Person_Type where Person.person_id = Person_Classification.person_id and Person_Classification.person_type_id = Person_Type.id and Person_Type.caption like '%Patient%'

select Person.short_name, Person.person_id from Person, Person_Classification, Person_Type where Person.person_id = Person_Classification.person_id and Person_Classification.person_type_id = Person_Type.id and Person_Type.caption like '%Physician%'

select Person.short_name, Person.person_id from Person, Person_Classification, Person_Type where Person.person_id = Person_Classification.person_id and Person_Classification.person_type_id = Person_Type.id and Person_Type.caption like '%Refer%'

select Org.org_id, Org.org_name, PersonOrg_Relationship.rel_type from Org, PersonOrg_Relationship, PersonOrg_Rel_Type, Record_Status where PersonOrg_Relationship.parent_id = ? and PersonOrg_Relationship.rel_entity_id = Org.org_id and PersonOrg_Relationship.rel_type_id = PersonOrg_Rel_Type.id and (PersonOrg_Rel_Type.caption = 'Employed (Full-time)' or PersonOrg_Rel_Type.caption = 'Employed (Part-time)') and PersonOrg_Relationship.rec_stat_id = Record_Status.id and Record_Status.caption = 'Active'
select name_prefix, name_first, name_middle, name_last, name_suffix, to_char(birth_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY'), to_char(death_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY'), from Person where Person.person_id = ?
